channel.title: Looking For Staff
channel.description:
Hi I was looking for some staff for AXSCAPE. AXSCAPE was a server quite a few years ago. and a very popular one. i took it down to work on it. i wanted HD ect...so now im lookin for developers to c wat we can do. since 508 clients came out
I Need Web Developers, Server Developers, And A Site Developer.
Right Now I Am Looking For Five Of Each
GOAL REACHED
Web Developer 0/5 Server Developer 0/5 Site Developer 0/5
Please Fill out this form to apply and i will get to u as soon as possible
Job Applying For: What You Know: Why do u think u shuld be one of my staff: What Do You know in java ( php & html if your applying for web dev) ....ect you can put in your own questions also
**** ALL STAFF WILL GET MOD/ADMIN IN GAME***

item.title: Looking For Staff
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:1, topic:219388”]Seems the rules were never put back so i’ll attempt to restore them, if anyone finds the old ones - feel free to move them back and delete this.

1) Read THIS before you ask a question. So realize this, don’t bother posting in this section with any stupid undetailed questions . They will be locked without warning.
2) We will not help with computer problems, ie: portforwarding, how to set up java and such. Use google or our Tutorial Section.
3) No development teams, however, showing off your recent development in runescape servers is accepted. We can make exceptions to the no development teams rule, pm a member of staff first.
4) No server or website advertisement in any topics of this section. You will be muted or banned.
5) Off-topic posts - It seems this section is basically used for a general discussion for you lot, I know this site is lacking boards but we are fighting to try get some changes.
6) Topic titles, use a brief descriptive title, a title such as “NEEEEED HELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP FAST!!!” is just annoying and won’t really help you get the help you need any faster.
7) Asking for a hoster is strictly forbidden.
8) When replying to a topic DO NOT respond with one word answers, or lines like “nice job 1 first post”. You will receive punishments

Users: If you see someone who is breaking one of the above rules, use the “Report to moderator” button under their post, and we will be notified. It may take a little time before it is solved.

Moderators: feel free to contact me on irc if theres anything you need to say.
I’ll leave this open for suggestions and your opinions on the rules, just stay on topic. I don’t need any ‘Thanks great rule’ type posts, you will be warned for posting such things and your post will be deleted.[/quote]
Read rule(s) 3.
Remove the post please or face a warning from moderator.

Read full topic
